author: cnbc.com
title: Chicago Rivet & Machine Co. Announces Year-End Earnings
text:
NAPERVILLE, Ill., March 20, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Chicago Rivet & Machine Co. (NYSE American, symbol: CVR) today announced audited results for the year 2017 as summarized below:
